flowers_description: Various descriptions and images of flowers will be displayed here.
name: Name
tulip_fact: Tulips were once more valuable than gold!
rose_fact: Roses have been symbols of love for centuries.
daisy_fact: Daisies close their flowers at night.
dahlia_fact: Dahlias originate from Mexico and were used as food.
poppy_fact: Poppies are symbols of remembrance for fallen soldiers.
testimonial1: This is the best flower site I have ever seen!
testimonial2: I found the perfect flowers for my garden.
mission_text: Our mission is to bring the beauty of flowers into every home and garden. We believe in the power of nature to inspire and heal.
history_image_alt: A historical image of our journey
history_text: Our journey began over 20 years ago with a small flower shop. Today, we are proud to have grown into a leading provider of flowers and plants.
team_text: Our team is made up of dedicated professionals who are passionate about bringing the beauty of flowers to you.
